Hi,

I apologise for the repeat post, but thought I might get some answers
=
second time around :-) Thanks.

I want to unit-test my database application=
, but am a bit confused
after reading Massol's 'JUnit in Action' and Rainsb=
erger's 'JUnit
Recipes'. Granted these books were published in 2004 and 200=
5
respectively, so may be a bit outdated.

JUnit in Action uses DynaMock fo=
r its database testing examples in
Chapter 11. Does DynaMock still exist or=
 is JMock the new version of
it? But JMock doesn't contain any specific SQL=
 classes, like
MockConnection, or?

EasyMock doesn't seem to have any SQL s=
pecific classes either.

So what's the latest recommendation of a mock obje=
ct implementation
when testing database applications?

Thanks,
Deirdre
